metadata.title: Gallery 21, Sadequain Foundation unite to promote cultural heritage

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):Sadequain Foundation and Gallery 21 have signed an MoU (Memorandum of Understanding) to promote art and culture through a permanent display of Sadequain's works and collaborative exhibitions, events, and educational initiatives. According to a press release issued by Sadequain Foundation on Thursday, the collaboration between the Sadequain Foundation, a non-profit organization, and Gallery 21, a leading art gallery in the capital, marks a significant stride in their joint mission to promote art and culture. As part of this partnership, Gallery 21 will host a permanent display of Sadequain's books, publications, and archival materials, making it a dedicated space to celebrate the legacy of one of Pakistan's greatest artistic icons. This collaboration also paves the way for joint events, exhibitions, and educational programs, further establishing Gallery 21 as a hub for cultural and intellectual exchange. With the signing of the MOU, this collaboration further strengthens the relationship between Gallery 21 and the Sadequain Foundation, ensuring a continued commitment to preserving, promoting, and celebrating the legacy of one of Pakistan's greatest artistic icons. Farrukh seir, Founder of Gallery 21 also presented a gold medal to Zohaib Chaudhry, Director of Planning and Promotion at the Sadequain Foundation.
